text: yuropiya bhasha pitaya beyijin nagaraye athi darshana wisharada(aacharya)upadhiya saha shasthrapathi upadhiya labadime pradhanathama eekakayaki. 2015warshaye sapthambar masaya wana witapitayeshasthriya upadhiya sandaha sisun409k da shasthrapathi upadhiya sandaha sisun24k saha darshana wisharada upadhiya sandaha sisun10deneku da liyapadinchi wi siti.yuropiya bhasha pitaya gunathmaka ha danumin poshitha sisu pirisak bihikirimata samawitama awadhanaya yomukarana athara ee sandaha bahu sanniwedana krama,samuhika puhunu kramaweda saha sisu kusalatha wardhana krama da upayogi karagani.shishyayin igena ganna kala parichchedaya thula shakthimath widesha bhasha mulika danumaka puhunuwak saha eeta samagamiwa adala ratawalaha pradeshawala sanskruthiya,jathika thathwayan pilibanda danumin da poshanaya karanu labayi.sisun bahutharayakata masa hayaka ho wasaraka kalasimawakata yatathwa adala wu widesha ratakata gos igena ganimata da awasthawak udawe.alpa washayen ingrisi bhashawa upayogi karagena dwithwa adhyayanaya upadhi,thewana‚Äìsiwwana widesha bhasha,waikalpitha ha wenath aakaraye ihala mattame widesha bhasha hakiya kusalatha wardhanaya kirimata da nirathuruwama uthsaha gani.

enam nosalakilimath/ aparikshakari dhawanaya, adhika wegayen riya padawima, tharagakarithwaya (meya podu prawahana paddhathiye wisheshayen kapipenena thaththwayaki), bimathwa riya dhawanaya, manasika aathathiya, nidimathen yuthuwa riya padawima, aushadha gena wahana padawima, pare thaththwaya nusudusu wima(parawal wiwidha nadaththu katayuthu sadaha kapa eewa nisi lesa pilisakara nokirima), awurudu 16,17 wayas wala pasuwana lamun winodanshayak lesa wahana dhawanaya kirima, adhika wahana gahanaya saha wahana wala karmika dosha aadiyayi.
